there!\""},{"lineNumber":47195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「千鶴子様、モハデの補給線付近に魔軍の発見アリ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Chizuruko, demon forces have been spotted near the Mohade supply line!"},{"lineNumber":47196,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このままですと、輸送隊が……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If this continues, the transport decision."},{"lineNumber":47199,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこは第21輸送隊ね？　一時進軍停止。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s the 21st transport unit, right? Stop their advance temporarily."},{"lineNumber":47200,"originalJapaneseLine":"　首都防衛隊の援軍が近づいてるから合流させて。","translatedEnglishLine":"Capital defense reinforcements are approaching, so have them link up."},{"lineNumber":47201,"originalJapaneseLine":"　護衛の合流ポイントはこっちで指定します」","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll designate the escort rendezvous point here.\""},{"lineNumber":47202,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それからさっきのスワンカラの撤退だけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Also, about the Swankara withdrawal earlier,"},{"lineNumber":47203,"originalJapaneseLine":"　第11遊撃隊に支援させて！","translatedEnglishLine":"have the 11th Mobile Unit support them!"},{"lineNumber":47204,"originalJapaneseLine":"　作戦後、帰り木の使用を許可します！」","translatedEnglishLine":"After the operation, grant permission to use the return wood!\""},{"lineNumber":47205,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、ははっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-Haha!\""},{"lineNumber":47206,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おー……こっちも動き始めたか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh... they’re starting to move here too.\""},{"lineNumber":47207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジック！　よかった、無事！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Magic! Thank goodness, you’re safe!?\""},{"lineNumber":47208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「千鶴子……ええ、なんとか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Chizuruko... yeah, somehow."},{"lineNumber":47209,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その、そっちは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Um, how about over there...?\""},{"lineNumber":47210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……平気……じゃ、ないけどね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... I’m not exactly fine."},{"lineNumber":47211,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう、仕事が次から次に、だから……","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s just that the work keeps coming one after another..."},{"lineNumber":47212,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それどころじゃなくて」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t even have time for that.\""},{"lineNumber":47213,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そっか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I see.\""},{"lineNumber":47214,"originalJapaneseLine":"陰はあったが、千鶴子が見せたのは","translatedEnglishLine":"Though there was a shadow, what Chizuruko showed"},{"lineNumber":47215,"originalJapaneseLine":"笑顔に違いなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"was unmistakably a smile."},{"lineNumber":47216,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それより、悪魔の件は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More importantly, about the demon incident...\""},{"lineNumber":47217,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……それは、平気。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... that’s all right."},{"lineNumber":47218,"originalJapaneseLine":"　悪魔は、いなくなっちゃったけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"The demons are gone now, but...\""},{"lineNumber":47219,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの詐欺悪魔は俺様が叩き潰してやった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I crushed that scam demon myself."},{"lineNumber":47220,"originalJapaneseLine":"　万事解決だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Everything’s settled.\""},{"lineNumber":47221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「悪質な……と、悪魔に言うのも、変ですけど。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Malicious... though it’s strange to say that about a demon."},{"lineNumber":47222,"originalJapaneseLine":"　危うい所でした」","translatedEnglishLine":"That was a close call.\""},{"lineNumber":47223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう。よかったわ、マジック……本当に」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’m glad. Really, Magic...\""},{"lineNumber":47224,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………うん。忙しい時に、ごめん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah. Sorry for bothering you when you’re busy.\""},{"lineNumber":47225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「忙しいのはいつものこと。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Being busy is the usual."},{"lineNumber":47226,"originalJapaneseLine":"　では改めて指揮をお願いするわ、陛下」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now then, once again, I ask you to take command, Your Majesty.\""},{"lineNumber":47227,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………うん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes!\""},{"lineNumber":47228,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……何とかなりそうですね、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It seems like something can be done, Lord Lance.\""},{"lineNumber":47229,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アホ。そんな簡単にいったら苦労せんわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Idiot. If it was that easy, it wouldn’t be such a hassle.\""},{"lineNumber":47230,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、メディウサは倒してくれるんでしょ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But you’ll take down Medusa, right?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、もう！　痛いって言ってるでしょ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "St-Stop it! I told you it hurts!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスにチョップを喰らわせて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She chopped Lance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは身体を離した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Magic pulled away from his body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったくもう……弱ってる暇もないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly... there's no time to be weak."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、マジックさん。ハンカチをどうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here, Magic-san. Here's a handkerchief."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありがと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 服装を整え、ハンカチで涙を拭き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She adjusted her clothes and wiped her tears with the handkerchief,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは元に戻った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Magic returned to her original self.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう、大丈夫ですか。陛下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you okay now, Your Majesty?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……ごめんね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... Sorry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、一件落着。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, case closed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの蛇女に、これ以上被害を出させてたまるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won’t let that snake woman cause any more damage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さ、帰るぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's go home."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、椅子を破壊してから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After destroying the chair,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マークへと戻っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others returned to Mark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 臨時首都、マーク――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The provisional capital, Mark—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が帰投すると、司令部は大騒ぎだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Lance and the others returned, the headquarters was in an uproar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、こちら、スワンカラ防衛隊！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-This is the Swankara Defense Unit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が三個大隊規模で侵攻中！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army is invading with the force of three battalions!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 援軍を求めます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Requesting reinforcements!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すぐに現場を放棄！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Abandon the site immediately!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道を使ってメポカの防衛隊と合流、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Use the highway to join up with the Mepoka Defense Unit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで防衛線を張って！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and establish a defensive line there!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「千鶴子様、モハデの補給線付近に魔軍の発見アリ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Chizuruko, demon forces have been spotted near the Mohade supply line!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままですと、輸送隊が……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this continues, the transport team...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情報魔法で映像を展開させ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They projected an image using information magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周辺の状況をすぐさま計算し、判断を済ませる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: instantly calculated the surrounding situation and made a decision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこは第21輸送隊ね？　一時進軍停止。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s the 21st transport unit, right? Stop their advance temporarily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都防衛隊の援軍が近づいてるから合流させて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Capital defense reinforcements are approaching, so have them link up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 護衛の合流ポイントはこっちで指定します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll designate the escort rendezvous point here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それからさっきのスワンカラの撤退だけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, about the Swankara withdrawal earlier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第11遊撃隊に支援させて！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have the 11th Mobile Unit support them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦後、帰り木の使用を許可します！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the operation, grant permission to use the return wood!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-Haha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おー……こっちも動き始めたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh... they’re starting to move here too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジック！　よかった、無事！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Magic! Thank goodness, you’re safe!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「千鶴子……ええ、なんとか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chizuruko... yeah, somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、そっちは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, how about over there...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……平気……じゃ、ないけどね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... I’m not exactly fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう、仕事が次から次に、だから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s just that the work keeps coming one after another...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それどころじゃなくて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t even have time for that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そっか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I see."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陰はあったが、千鶴子が見せたのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though there was a shadow, what Chizuruko showed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑顔に違いなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was unmistakably a smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより、悪魔の件は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, about the demon incident..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……それは、平気。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... that’s all right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔は、いなくなっちゃったけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demons are gone now, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの詐欺悪魔は俺様が叩き潰してやった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I crushed that scam demon myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 万事解決だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everything’s settled."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「悪質な……と、悪魔に言うのも、変ですけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Malicious... though it’s strange to say that about a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 危うい所でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was a close call."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう。よかったわ、マジック……本当に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’m glad. Really, Magic..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………うん。忙しい時に、ごめん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yeah. Sorry for bothering you when you’re busy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「忙しいのはいつものこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Being busy is the usual.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では改めて指揮をお願いするわ、陛下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, once again, I ask you to take command, Your Majesty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……何とかなりそうですね、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It seems like something can be done, Lord Lance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アホ。そんな簡単にいったら苦労せんわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Idiot. If it was that easy, it wouldn’t be such a hassle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、メディウサは倒してくれるんでしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you’ll take down Medusa, right?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、もう！　痛いって言ってるでしょ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "St-Stop it! I told you it hurts!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスにチョップを喰らわせて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She chopped Lance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは身体を離した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Magic pulled away from his body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったくもう……弱ってる暇もないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly... there's no time to be weak."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、マジックさん。ハンカチをどうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here, Magic-san. Here's a handkerchief."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありがと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 服装を整え、ハンカチで涙を拭き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She adjusted her clothes and wiped her tears with the handkerchief,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは元に戻った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Magic returned to her original self.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう、大丈夫ですか。陛下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you okay now, Your Majesty?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……ごめんね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... Sorry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、一件落着。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, case closed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの蛇女に、これ以上被害を出させてたまるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won’t let that snake woman cause any more damage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さ、帰るぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's go home."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、椅子を破壊してから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After destroying the chair,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マークへと戻っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others returned to Mark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 臨時首都、マーク――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The provisional capital, Mark—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が帰投すると、司令部は大騒ぎだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Lance and the others returned, the headquarters was in an uproar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、こちら、スワンカラ防衛隊！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-This is the Swankara Defense Unit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が三個大隊規模で侵攻中！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army is invading with the force of three battalions!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 援軍を求めます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Requesting reinforcements!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すぐに現場を放棄！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Abandon the site immediately!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道を使ってメポカの防衛隊と合流、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Use the highway to join up with the Mepoka Defense Unit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで防衛線を張って！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and establish a defensive line there!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「千鶴子様、モハデの補給線付近に魔軍の発見アリ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Chizuruko, demon forces have been spotted near the Mohade supply line!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままですと、輸送隊が……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this continues, the transport team...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情報魔法で映像を展開させ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They projected an image using information magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周辺の状況をすぐさま計算し、判断を済ませる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: instantly calculated the surrounding situation and made a decision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこは第21輸送隊ね？　一時進軍停止。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s the 21st transport unit, right? Stop their advance temporarily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都防衛隊の援軍が近づいてるから合流させて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Capital defense reinforcements are approaching, so have them link up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 護衛の合流ポイントはこっちで指定します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll designate the escort rendezvous point here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それからさっきのスワンカラの撤退だけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, about the Swankara withdrawal earlier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第11遊撃隊に支援させて！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have the 11th Mobile Unit support them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦後、帰り木の使用を許可します！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the operation, grant permission to use the return wood!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-Haha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おー……こっちも動き始めたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh... they’re starting to move here too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジック！　よかった、無事！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Magic! Thank goodness, you’re safe!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「千鶴子……ええ、なんとか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chizuruko... yeah, somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、そっちは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, how about over there...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……平気……じゃ、ないけどね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... I’m not exactly fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう、仕事が次から次に、だから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s just that the work keeps coming one after another...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それどころじゃなくて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t even have time for that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そっか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I see."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陰はあったが、千鶴子が見せたのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though there was a shadow, what Chizuruko showed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑顔に違いなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was unmistakably a smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより、悪魔の件は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, about the demon incident..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……それは、平気。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... that’s all right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔は、いなくなっちゃったけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demons are gone now, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの詐欺悪魔は俺様が叩き潰してやった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I crushed that scam demon myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 万事解決だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everything’s settled."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「悪質な……と、悪魔に言うのも、変ですけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Malicious... though it’s strange to say that about a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 危うい所でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was a close call."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう。よかったわ、マジック……本当に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’m glad. Really, Magic..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………うん。忙しい時に、ごめん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yeah. Sorry for bothering you when you’re busy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「忙しいのはいつものこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Being busy is the usual.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では改めて指揮をお願いするわ、陛下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, once again, I ask you to take command, Your Majesty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……何とかなりそうですね、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It seems like something can be done, Lord Lance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アホ。そんな簡単にいったら苦労せんわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Idiot. If it was that easy, it wouldn’t be such a hassle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、メディウサは倒してくれるんでしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you’ll take down Medusa, right?"
